title: Guess the Number
description: A fun and interactive game where users try to guess a randomly generated number within a limited number of attempts. This project showcases the use of JavaScript for logic and React for the user interface.

title: Furnish-Me
description: An application that allows users to visualize furniture in their own space using augmented reality. This project highlights the integration of AR technology with a user-friendly interface.

title: Pokemon-Desk
description: A web application that allows users to search for and view details about their favorite Pok√©mon. This project demonstrates the use of APIs to fetch data and display it dynamically.

title: World Atlas
description: An interactive map application that allows users to explore different countries and their statistics. This project showcases the use of mapping libraries and data visualization techniques.

title: React Portfolio
description: A personal portfolio website built with React to showcase projects and skills. This project emphasizes responsive design and modern web development practices.

title: Coffee-shop
description: An e-commerce application for a coffee shop that allows users to browse products, add them to a cart, and make purchases. This project showcases the use of state management and routing in React.
